thread.section_title: The Paper Factory Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Long Island City, New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of The Paper Factory Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ExperienceMy31
title: Great Location
text:
Looking for hotels in New York is stressful especially if you are looking for spinning affordable and with your own bathroom. We found the Paper Factory Hotel on TripAdvisor and Booking.com and decided to go for it. This hotel turned out to be great.
Pro: location - just walk out the door and you are right at the entrance to the M and R trains
Cleanliness - no issues here, pretty clean
Heat/AC - our room had good working heat and air. Good because it was frigid outside and we couldn't event tell.
Con: not really any to mention
I loved the modern style mixed with the retro lobby. Best part of our stay was the location of the subway. We were able to walk right on to the trains most of the timr.
This hotel looks like it is going through upgrades/renovations/finishing touches so workers were all over the place. Guess it's good that they keep up on the wear and tear.
I would totally recommend things hotel to anyone. On fact I already have, on the plane ride back home.
